cleaned_text: Autism and Vaccinations? The topic of if vaccines cause autism to me is a very good subject to talk about. Whether or not autism and vaccinations are linked together might depend if an individual is up to speed on the subject and has actually investigated this kind of topic. I will personally be taking the side that vaccinations do not cause autism and I will give information regarding why I feel the way I do. I will also talk about how this rumor started. Autism spectrum disorder (ASD)is a developmental disability that can cause significant social, communication, and behavioral challenges. According to the CDC a study has shown that about 1 of 54 children have been identified with having ASD among these communities across the United States. The CDC also states that there are many people that have had concerns that ASD is linked with vaccinations that the children might receive, but studies have shown and proved that there are no links or correlation between a child receiving a vaccination and developing ASD. The CDC also did a study back in 2013 to add more data to the fact that there is no correlation.
